page.title: 06WELBECK ABBEY
page.content: The Welbeck Estates Company owns most of the land in this area. Welbeck Abbey is the seat of the Portland family and although the family no longer live in the Abbey they still occupy Welbeck Woodhouse, a large house in the park. The park is private property and the public are not allowed to wander at will. As a result, little has changed since the nineteenth century and the narrow estate roads wind for miles among planted woodland and open countryside. There are numerous old buildings which have been converted to other uses. The huge Riding School built by the 5th Duke of Portland is now used as a warehouse by a publishing company. The old school is now the hospital for Welbeck College and other buildings are used as accommodation for the staff.
